operation.name: InsertOrUpdate
operation.sql: INSERT INTO message_read_outbox (user_id, message_id, peer_type, peer_id, read_user_id, read_date) VALUES (:user_id, :message_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :read_user_id, :read_date) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE read_date=VALUES(read_date)

operation.name: SelectList
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_id, message_id, peer_type, peer_id, read_user_id, read_date FROM message_read_outbox WHERE user_id = :user_id AND message_id = :message_id
